description:
Despite Taishakuten’s pleas, the flames of Ashura’s wrath refuse to quell. They were once friends, but that is no longer true. What happened in the distant past?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kako e wa Modorenu ga Mirai wa Susumeru
You Cannot Return to the Past but You Can Carry On with the Future
過去へは戻れぬが未来は進める
